coreAttributes.name: Desert Snapper Spit
coreAttributes.description: The vial contains Desert Snapper "spit" from the land of Merra. For safety reasonings, the contents have been made magically inert so you can enjoy the salty delicacy without and risk of its side effects. "warning product distributors cannot be held liable if consumer enchants said products to access side effects".
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] starts to have a salty taste in their mouth

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the container and is instantly hit with an intoxicating musky smell, you look at the vicus liquid as it sloshes in the container. Unsure about your decision you hesitantly put the vial to your lips and down it in one. As it goes down your throat it leaves a salty aftertaste in your mouth.
